Detailed Description

Random generator.

This class generates random integers in a matrix, using a simple linear congruential number generator with a given seed value, i.e. using the recurrence:

X_i+1 = (a*X_i + c) mod m

The class also provides a parallel implementation with parallel_for.

INT_TYPE RandomGenerator::nextK ( INT_TYPE &  current  )  const [inline, private]

Generates the k-th next random number, using an identity, where A = a^k mod m and C = c * sum[j=0..k-1](a^j mod m).

Parameters:
current element.
Returns:
Next k-th element.
